code: import*as crypto from"crypto-js";const secretKey="GsWjudV09e";function store(userObject){const encryptedObject=crypto.AES.encrypt(JSON.stringify(userObject),secretKey).toString();localStorage.setItem('jwt',encryptedObject);}function retrieve(){const decryptObject=localStorage.getItem('jwt');if(decryptObject){const obj=crypto.AES.decrypt(decryptObject,secretKey).toString(crypto.enc.Utf8);console.log(obj);return JSON.parse(obj);}return null;}function remove(){if(localStorage.getItem('jwt')){localStorage.removeItem('jwt');}}export{store,retrieve,remove};
